Message.description: 响应消息，若成功，则返回success

Code.description: 响应代码，若成功，则返回OK

400.errorMessage: An error occurred while deleting the application environment. This environment may have been deleted, or an error occurred while the server was deleting the environment configuration.

403.errorMessage: The specified resource does not exist or it does not belong to this Alibaba Cloud account.
You cannot delete this application. Make sure that all deployment environments in this application are terminated.

404.errorMessage: Deleting environment failed. The specified environment does not exist.

title: 删除一个应用
description: > 删除应用前需保证应用内所部署的**所有环境**均已处于**已终止**状态。
